entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
